title: The Butcher of Oxford
description:
A Timeless Gay Romance
 set at Oxford University.
 Book 2  Jake Weston Mystery Series.Timothy Ashlock risks everything to travel back in time and save his true love, Jake Weston-- but almost immediately someone is murdering  the musicians in the Oxford Student Orchestra.  
Who is the Butcher of Oxford? 
DCI Carl Bridges thinks the couple may be involved in the crimes. Can the boys uncover the Butcher before they end up in jail, or worse?This thriller has twists and turns that will keep the reader guessing until the final surprising outcome.  It presents a whole new take on time travel and an unapologetic look at modern LGBTQ relationships in college.   "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one."  --Albert Einstein
author: Marko Realmonte
